text: Gloria Mange (18 June 1931 – 8 July 2023)http://www.tiempo.com.mx/noticia/mange_actriz_fallecer_oro_anos_supervivientes_cine_epoca_causa/ was a Mexican movie actress.Riera p.135 She was a known actress during the Golden Age of Mexican cinema. She was born in Ciudad Obregón, Sonora. Her best known roles were in Primero soy mexicano (1950), What Has That Woman Done to You? (1951), If I Were a Congressman (1952) and in The Unknown Mariachi (1953). ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors
title: Gloria Mange
